error.message: Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763

Call to deprecated function libraries_get_path(): Will be removed before a stable Drupal 8 release. Please use the new library load and managment concepts described at: https://www.drupal.org/node/2170763
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to ckeditor_indentblock.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.

The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement compatible with Drupal 9.
